entities.name: sword
entities.description: The sword is described as the one indispensable weapon against the Horcruxes.

entities.name: horcruxes
entities.description: Horcruxes are mentioned as the enemies that the sword is used to fight against.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is described as a house that has been proud of its values and history.

entities.name: muggleborns
entities.description: Muggleborns are mentioned as a group that Gryffindor has championed.

entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: Slytherin is described as a house that loves purebloods and clashes with Gryffindor.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the person who is questioning whether Gryffindor stole the sword.

entities.name: grip-507
entities.description: Grip-507 is mentioned as an object that Harry is holding.

relationships.description: Harry has doubt about whether Gryffindor stole the sword.
